entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC crash #68769
  • Implementing IOptionMonad<T, Self> from the dotNext project in a type in another project is impossible #68767
  • Collection literal parsing doesn't handle a few cases well/properly. #68766

PullRequests

Created

  • Retain semicolon during updates of IndexerDeclaration #68768
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for editing types with primary constructors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Test and fix for passing default through #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection expressions vs conditional access expressions #68756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
